skills.name: DEAD ON ARRIVAL
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Cleanse any ally inflicted with Silence.
• 50% Chance to instantly Trigger any Time Bombs present on the target.
• Inflict a Time Bomb for 2 turns if there is no Time Bomb currently on the target.

skills.name: BODILY HARM
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 45% Chance to Heal Block the target for 2 turns.
• 25% Chance to Disable Passives of the target for 2 turns.

skills.name: GUARDIAN
desc: Cannot be Stunned, Taunted, Slept, or Frozen (including by unblockable Freeze).
